tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I underwent a root canal procedure at Dental Planet, and I am extremely pleased with the care provided by Dr. Pavani k Reddy. Her expertise and professionalism were evident throughout. The facility is well-maintained and adheres to high cleanliness standards. Communication was clear, with detailed explanations of the root canal process. The overall quality of care exceeded my expectations. I highly recommend Dental Planet, particularly for their excellent service in performing root canal treatments.
